subject: RE: RE: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber
description_text:
Hi Ariel,

Good day!
Thanks for the quote.
As we talked on Wechat, please double check the offer because the price has increased significantly compared to the current models we have been working.
I also need you to provide the price for the P2 and P3 models without hydraulic rod.
I wait for your feedback.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBF70B.6C5DA920]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

From: support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 17, 2025 3:57 AM
To: Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com>
Subject: Re: RE: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber

I have attached the quotation sheet for you.  We will sort out the UPC for you later

________________________________
support@simsonn.com<mailto:support@simsonn.com>

From: Paulo Franca<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>
Date: 2025-07-05 00:58
To: support@simsonn.com<mailto:support@simsonn.com>
CC: lillian@simsonn.com<mailto:lillian@simsonn.com>
Subject: RE: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber
Ok, I wait for your feedback.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBF70B.6C5DA920]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

From: support@simsonn.com<mailto:support@simsonn.com> <support@simsonn.com<mailto:support@simsonn.com>>

Cc: lillian@simsonn.com<mailto:lillian@simsonn.com>
Subject: Re: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber

Hi Paulo Franca,

As we are currently relocating our factory, I’ll check with my colleagues tomorrow to see if they can provide the necessary information, and I’ll send it to you via WeChat.

On Wed, 2 Jul at 2:49 PM , Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>> wrote:
Sorry, but I don’t agree.
I must provide the Manual in Portuguese.
How Am I supposed to do it?
You can send the file for translation and send me the Manual in Portuguese, if you are worried about data protection.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director

To: Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>>
Cc: lillian@simsonn.com<mailto:lillian@simsonn.com>
Subject: Re: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber

Hi，Paulo Franca，

由于知识产权保护，我们无法提供PDF以外的版本。感谢您的理解与支持。

Could you send the file in word format so we can send it to translation.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director

conversations.body_text: Hi Paulo Franca,  I'm part of the after-sales support team. For any sales or order-related inquiries, please feel free to contact our sales representative via WeChat — they will be able to assist you more directly.

I don’t understand, Ariel said this is her email.


Paulo Franca

USA:+1 949 508 0061

Skype: miumarunner

________________________________

Hi Ariel,

Thanks for the quote.
As we discussed, please send me an updated quote as below:
Pro Plus pedals with regular control box (already quoted)
Pro Plus Pedals with Plus X Pedal Control Box
VAM PRO SET 2 Pac
VAM PRO SET 3 Pac
VAM SET 2 Pac
VAM SET 3 Pac
Elastometer
Thin black spring (for throttle)

I wait for the updated offer.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBFBBB.21CD4B40]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>
